name: Eclipsed Kingdom
description:
This is my very first game I have have created that I wanted to share with everyone. Since its my first game there might be small technical hiccups that are beyond my control but nothing too serious that ruins the game-play. This game is a homage to  another game that inspired it, The Valley Rule. As such you collect new abilities and find chest to unlock a mysterious door. Thank you for choosing to play this you have no idea how much this means to me.

Controls:

Z-Perform Ability

X-Interact Objects

Space- Jump

P-Pause
